Text:
Greetings Sir Bestec.
Yes I'm alive. 
I got busy with job hence not enough time to browse through porn hence missing from TPB.
But I came to present my salutations to you for your untiring service and contribution to this community.
My best wishes to you and your family.
Have a great weekend.
Great vids, but 0(20) seeds and stuck @ 97%.  Ahh the frustration!
